Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Kenton
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, and Cicero due to, construction near at 59th/Kenton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, and Cicero due to, construction near at 59th/Kenton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due to earlier police activity.

Allow extra travel time.
